mapper.select: SELECT l.*, li.* FROM location l JOIN location_image li ON l.LOCATION_ID = li.LOCATION_ID ORDER BY l.LOCATION_REVIEW_COUNT DESC

SELECT l.*, li.*, lr.LOCATION_REVIEW_CONTENT1, lr.LOCATION_REVIEW_CONTENT2, lr.LOCATION_REVIEW_CONTENT3, lr.LOCATION_REVIEW_CONTENT4, lr.LOCATION_REVIEW_CONTENT5 FROM location l LEFT OUTER JOIN location_image li ON l.LOCATION_ID = li.LOCATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN location_review lr ON l.LOCATION_ID = lr.LOCATION_ID WHERE l.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId}
